summary: This is a 30-minute inmate check sheet from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York Special Housing Unit, likely documenting observation rounds for an inmate. The document includes time frames and staff signatures, indicating routine prison monitoring procedures.
locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York Special Housing Unit
keyFacts: Document is a prison check sheet from MCC New York Special Housing Unit.
Shows 30-minute observation schedule for inmates in confinement status (administrative detention or disciplinary segregation).
Indicates staff must observe inmates at least twice per hour on an irregular schedule.
Contains time frames and signature columns for staff documenting rounds.
Part of the Epstein case document set, potentially related to his incarceration period.
